titles.title: To deauthorize a portion of the Raritan River Navigation Channel, New Jersey.
To deauthorize a portion of the Raritan River Navigation Channel, New Jersey.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

bill.summary: This bill deauthorizes a portion of the project for navigation, Raritan River, New Jersey, authorized by the Rivers and Harbors Act of 1937. The portion deauthorized is known as the Titanium Reach of the South Channel.
